Html:
I'm not sure if this code is still being updated and supported, I re-wrote a lot of it to support no files being written to server, everything stays in memory on the server.

Another enhancement was if you save a file from access the zip class can't unencrypt it(access saves an image with the data that can't be unecrypted), we now have a way to determine if this is the case and throw an error back to user that this is the problem.

I'll be happy to share if anyone is interested.

That sounds useful. Yes, the project is still being updated, but slowly.

 

Are you able to integrate your changes into the main codebase? If so, do they contain unit tests?
